insert: insert into person (name,fbid,country,teachers,schools,person_hash) values ($MDAw$Nox Freebird$MDAw$,$MDAw$3$MDAw$,$MDAw$il$MDAw$,ARRAY[$MDAw$person2$MDAw$,$MDAw$person1$MDAw$],ARRAY[$MDAw$school0$MDAw$],$MDAw$person0$MDAw$) returning person.*;
insertReturning: insert into person (name,fbid,country,teachers,schools,person_xattrs,person_hash) values ($MDAw$Nik Frank$MDAw$,$MDAw$4$MDAw$,$MDAw$il$MDAw$,ARRAY[$MDAw$person2$MDAw$],ARRAY[$MDAw$school1$MDAw$,$MDAw$school0$MDAw$],$MDAw${"mainlang":"js"}$MDAw$::json,$MDAw$person1$MDAw$) returning person.person_hash,person.country;
insertReturningXattr: insert into person (name,fbid,country,teachers,schools,person_xattrs,person_hash) values ($MDAw$Yaakov Moishe$MDAw$,$MDAw$5$MDAw$,$MDAw$us$MDAw$,null,ARRAY[$MDAw$school1$MDAw$,$MDAw$school0$MDAw$],$MDAw${"mainlang":"c#"}$MDAw$::json,$MDAw$person2$MDAw$) returning person.person_hash,json_extract_path(person.person_xattrs,'mainlang') as mainlang;
insertBatch: insert into school (name,country,teachers,students,school_hash) values ($MDAw$javascript school$MDAw$,$MDAw$il$MDAw$,ARRAY[$MDAw$person2$MDAw$,$MDAw$person1$MDAw$],ARRAY[$MDAw$person0$MDAw$],$MDAw$school0$MDAw$),($MDAw$web arch school$MDAw$,$MDAw$us$MDAw$,ARRAY[$MDAw$person2$MDAw$],ARRAY[$MDAw$person1$MDAw$],$MDAw$school1$MDAw$) returning school.*;
